verses.verse: Remember, <S%H2142><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> is come <S%H1961><s%> upon us: consider, <S%H5027><s%> and behold <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> our reproach. <S%H2781><s%>
Our inheritance <S%H5159><s%> is turned <S%H2015><s%> to strangers, <S%H2114><s%> our houses <S%H1004><s%> to aliens. <S%H5237><s%>
We are <S%H1961><s%> orphans <S%H3490><s%> and fatherless, <S%H369><s%> <S%H1><s%> our mothers <S%H517><s%> are as widows. <S%H490><s%>
We have drunken <S%H8354><s%> our water <S%H4325><s%> for money; <S%H3701><s%> our wood <S%H6086><s%> is sold <S%H935><s%> <S%H4242><s%> unto us.
Our necks <S%H6677><s%> are under <S%H5921><s%> persecution: <S%H7291><s%> we labor, <S%H3021><s%> and have no rest. <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5117><s%>
We have given <S%H5414><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> to the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> and to the Assyrians, <S%H804><s%> to be satisfied <S%H7646><s%> with bread. <S%H3899><s%>
Our fathers <S%H1><s%> have sinned, <S%H2398><s%> and are not; <S%H369><s%> and we <S%H587><s%> have borne <S%H5445><s%> their iniquities. <S%H5771><s%>
Servants <S%H5650><s%> have ruled over <S%H4910><s%> us: there is none <S%H369><s%> that doth deliver <S%H6561><s%> us out of their hand. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%>
We got <S%H935><s%> our bread <S%H3899><s%> with the peril of our lives <S%H5315><s%> because of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> of the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>
Our skin <S%H5785><s%> was black <S%H3648><s%> like an oven <S%H8574><s%> because of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the terrible <S%H2152><s%> famine. <S%H7458><s%>
They ravished <S%H6031><s%> the women <S%H802><s%> in Zion, <S%H6726><s%> and the maids <S%H1330><s%> in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%>
Princes <S%H8269><s%> are hanged up <S%H8518><s%> by their hand: <S%H3027><s%> the faces <S%H6440><s%> of elders <S%H2205><s%> were not <S%H3808><s%> honored. <S%H1921><s%>
They took <S%H5375><s%> the young men <S%H970><s%> to grind, <S%H2911><s%> and the children <S%H5288><s%> fell <S%H3782><s%> under the wood. <S%H6086><s%>
The elders <S%H2205><s%> have ceased <S%H7673><s%> from the gate, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8179><s%> the young men <S%H970><s%> from their music. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5058><s%>
The joy <S%H4885><s%> of our heart <S%H3820><s%> is ceased; <S%H7673><s%> our dance <S%H4234><s%> is turned <S%H2015><s%> into mourning. <S%H60><s%>
The crown <S%H5850><s%> is fallen <S%H5307><s%> from our head: <S%H7218><s%> woe <S%H188><s%> unto us, that <S%H3588><s%> we have sinned! <S%H2398><s%>
For <S%H5921><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> our heart <S%H3820><s%> is <S%H1961><s%> faint; <S%H1739><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things our eyes <S%H5869><s%> are dim. <S%H2821><s%>
Because of <S%H5921><s%> the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of Zion, <S%H6726><s%> which <S%H7945><s%> is desolate, <S%H8074><s%> the foxes <S%H7776><s%> walk <S%H1980><s%> upon it.
Thou, <S%H859><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> remainest <S%H3427><s%> forever; <S%H5769><s%> thy throne <S%H3678><s%> from generation <S%H1755><s%> to generation. <S%H1755><s%>
Wherefore <S%H4100><s%> dost thou forget <S%H7911><s%> us forever, <S%H5331><s%> and forsake <S%H5800><s%> us so long <S%H753><s%> time? <S%H3117><s%>
Turn <S%H7725><s%> thou us unto <S%H413><s%> thee, O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and we shall be turned; <S%H7725><s%> renew <S%H2318><s%> our days <S%H3117><s%> as of old. <S%H6924><s%>
But <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> thou hast utterly rejected <S%H3988><s%> <S%H3988><s%> us; thou art very wroth <S%H7107><s%> <S%H5704><s%> <S%H3966><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> us.
